install.name: mg_menu
install.author: Moln√°r Gergely
install.description: Creates Horizontal Drop Down Menu with horizontal submenus. Edit CSS modules/mod_mg_menu/mg_menu.css to customize. sources: http://www.alistapart.com/articles/hybrid ; mod_fynmenu http://ifyn.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: menutype
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: The name of the menu (default is 'mainmenu')

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Menu Orientation
param.description: Horizontal or vertical menu controlled by css
